title: ACT to embed thermal management in Carbon Mapper structures
summary: Advanced Cooling Technologies (ACT), a thermal management specialist, announced a contract with Planet to design and build structures for the first two Carbon Mapper methane-monitoring satellites.

title: Hubble discovers exoplanet unconventionally forming at an extreme distance, NASA confirms 5,000 discovered exoplanets
summary: In recent weeks, two teams of researchers released studies identifying the strange characteristics of two exoplanets using the joint NASA and European Space Agency (ESA) Hubble Space Telescope. Specifically, one study found one exoplanet to be intensely forming at an extreme distance from its parent star, and the other found several exoplanets to feature bizarre weather phenomena in their atmospheres.

title: Halifax International raising funds to build imaging satellites for Ukraine
summary: Satellogic would produce satellites for Ukraine under a Halifax International initiative

title: SpaceX rapidly pivots from Dragon landing to another launch in 39 hours
summary: "I just want to reiterate that safety is still and always the top priority."

title: Space companies donate funds for humanitarian efforts in Ukraine
summary: Several firms in the commercial space industry have each pledged $50,000 to finance humanitarian efforts in Ukraine
